robot_capabilities.duneRunner: High-force robot designed for pushing or bracing against heavy rusted structures. Equipped with an arm and thermal pads to heat and expand tight seams.
robot_capabilities.aquaRover: Dexterous manipulator robot with a precision arm. Equipped with a gripper, oil sprayer for rust loosening, and latch-checking sensors. Initiates unlocking.
robot_capabilities.shoreHauler: Pulling and support robot equipped with a hook system and backup traction. It is equipped with arm arm.

robot_morphology.duneRunner: Force Output: ~150 N, Speed: 0–3.5 m/s, Weight: 45 kg, Size: 800 × 400 × 550 mm, Push Arm: Front-mounted, Torque Mode: Enabled, Thermal Pads: Yes
robot_morphology.aquaRover: Grip Force: ~150 N, Speed: 0–2.5 m/s, Weight: 30 kg, Size: 400 × 350 × 200 mm, Arm Reach: 400 mm, Gripper: Precision, Tools: Handle gripper, Oil sprayer, Rust sensor
robot_morphology.shoreHauler: Pull Force: ~150 N, Speed: 0–2 m/s, Weight: 30 kg, Size: 1000 × 600 × 500 mm, Pull Hook: Mounted, Support Mode: Active, Traction Assist: Enabled

task_specific_rules: A rusted metal door is force of 300 N to open.
task_replanning_rules: If door remains stuck, repeat spraying and heating before applying more force
